title.narrative: 2017 Management Project - HALI Access Network Indaba

description.narrative: The 2nd annual HALI Indaba will be held in Kibuye, Rwanda from April 23-25th 2017. Bridge2Rwanda, one of HALI’s founding members, is the in-country host. The Indaba will convene representatives (program managers, founders) from HALI’s 28 members – small, local, African-based organizations focused on preparing high-achieving, low-income students for higher education. Members will share experiences and develop a sustainable governance and operational structure for HALI and its membership. Members will also devise HALI’s strategy for coordinated engagement with the international higher education admissions community, including defining priority issues for focus in 2017-2018. Ultimately, the Indaba will strengthen HALI’s ability to connect low income students across Africa with higher education opportunities.
